docs.lead_paragraph: Democrats can’t match the Koch brothers’ unlimited money, but they can use their political pulpits to fight for a few basic principles.

headline.main: The Democrats Stand Up to the Kochs
headline.print_headline: The Democrats Stand Up to the Kochs

docs.abstract: Editorial praises effort lead by Sen Harry Reid to expose and criticize billionaires like the Koch brothers who are using their wealth to dismantle Democratic initiatives and give Republicans control of Senate in midterm elections; holds it is high time Democrats fought back against the corrupting influence of wealthy industrialists who only seek to further their financial gain.
docs.snippet: Democrats can’t match the Koch brothers’ unlimited money, but they can use their political pulpits to fight for a few basic principles.

docs.lead_paragraph: Let’s help states with health care online enrollment problems, not impugn their efforts, as Republicans are doing.
docs.abstract: Editorial criticizes Republicans for their cynical attempt to capitalize on problems in certain state-run health care exchanges that have slowed enrollment and left some without insurance; calls on Republicans to end harassment and instead focus on getting coverage for those in need.
docs.snippet: Let’s help states with health care online enrollment problems, not impugn their efforts, as Republicans are doing.

docs.lead_paragraph: Three Louisiana insurers agreed on Monday to continue to accept payments from a federal program for low-income people with HIV/AIDS to cover their Obamacare insurance premiums, the carriers said during a hearing in U.S. District Court.

headline.main: Louisiana Insurers to Accept Funds From Federal AIDS Program for Obamacare Premiums
headline.print_headline: Louisiana Insurers to Accept Funds From Federal AIDS Program for Obamacare Premiums

docs.snippet: Three Louisiana insurers agreed on Monday to continue to accept payments from a federal program for low-income people with HIV/AIDS to cover their Obamacare insurance premiums, the carriers said during a hearing in U.S. District Court.

docs.lead_paragraph: British pension providers will do more to ensure customers get the best deal when they retire by providing advice and helping them shop around for annuities, the insurance industry's trade body pledged on Monday.

headline.main: UK Insurance Industry Promises Pension Annuity Reforms
headline.print_headline: UK Insurance Industry Promises Pension Annuity Reforms

docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic Senate candidates, facing withering criticism on the national health care law, are gambling they can turn voters against two billionaire brothers funding the attacks — even if few Americans would recognize the pair on the street.

docs.lead_paragraph: The local Chinese official remembers all too clearly the panic he felt in Room 109. He had refused again and again to confess to bribery he says he didn't commit, and his four Communist Party interrogators were forcing his legs farther apart than they could go.

headline.main: In China, Brutality Yields Confessions of Graft
headline.print_headline: In China, Brutality Yields Confessions of Graft
